hackathon-judging-criteria.judging-criterion: Your app should be innovative and disruptive
Your app should solve a real-world problem highlighted by one of the challenges
No slide ware. Complete apps only - no slide ware or screen shots!
Best use of platform provided: Forum APIs, IBM Bluemix, Ericsson Service Innovation Framework Platform, Sierra Wireless, TELUS and BC Open Data
